entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add non-allocating overload of JsonEncodedText.Encode that allows the caller to own the memory #68747
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.DateOnlyConverter and System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter classes #68743
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TryUpdateOrRemove for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #68742
  • The msftbot account locking conversations is annoying #68740

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #68565
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter class #68744
  • Converting to `DateOnly/TimeOnly` from string #59253
    7.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'NLog.Web.AspNetCore, Version=4.0.0.0' #68720
  • [API Proposal]: Add equality operations on string for ReadOnlySpan<char> #68746
  • Segmentation fault with linux--arm64 self contained hello world console app #68731

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert RsaPaddingProcessor to statics #68749
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary throwOnPrematureClosure in ManagedWebSocket. #68745
    area-System.Net
  • Remove GTF_GLOB_REF on a few more addressing nodes #68741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid string-related allocation from GetCSharpString in XML serializer #68738
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • JIT: fix loop recognition in OSR PGO methods #68725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix RegexCompiler regression on 32-bit for some set matching #68655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocation in Process.GetProcessesByName #68705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Clean up some debug-only code in Regex #68721
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Simplify AssemblyName marshalling between VM and CoreLib #68735
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers version #68724
    area-Meta
  • [MONO] Refactored code into marshal-ilgen and marshal-shared. #68656
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mitigate stress hangs by marking GC-sensitive tests as out-of-proc #68733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • Delete unmanaged AssemblyName parser #68737
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization
